DOC.brief_summary: Case control study evaluate different factor ( e.g muscle strength , psychological factor ) associate full recovery functional status 6 month surgical repair shoulder instability .
DOC.brief_title: Factors Associated With Full Recovery After Surgical Repair Shoulder Instability
DOC.detailed_description: In study investigator try find correlation different factor functional ability patient 6 month post shoulder surgery . Patients examine single encounter muscle strength , fear avoidance beliefs functional ability . Functional ability examine use two validated questionnaire : 1 . The Western Ontario Shoulder Instability index ( WOSI ) 2 . Disabilities Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) Fear avoidance evaluate use Fear Avoidance Belief Questionnaire ( FABQ ) Muscle strength rotator cuff muscle measure use Biodex Isokinetic system , model 4 .
DOC.criteria: 2628 week s/p surgical repair shoulder instability At least 1 shoulder dislocation prior surgery Previous surgery either shoulder Any injury nonoperated shoulder last 6 month Any history shoulder dislocation subluxation nonoperated shoulder Any tendon repair surgery .
